text: @realDonaldTrump As new coronavirus cases soar across the South and Southwest, let us reflect on the fact that there is no one in charge of any national plan to deal with this. This is the real American carnage. And we are only seeing the very beginning of it.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
